---
name: "powershell-standards"
description: "PowerShell module and script authoring standards for the repository."
applyTo: "**/*.ps1,**/*.psm1"
---

# PowerShell Standards

- Follow approved verb/noun naming and module layout.
- Include `PSScriptAnalyzer` rules and a `tests/` folder with Pester tests.
- Avoid hard-coded credentials; prefer KeyVault or environment configs.
# PowerShell Standards

- Follow approved verb/noun naming and module layout.
- Include `PSScriptAnalyzer` rules and a `tests/` folder with Pester tests.
- Avoid hard-coded credentials; prefer KeyVault or environment configs.
